```{r}
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
library(broom.mixed)
library(openxlsx)
```

```{r} 
# Reading the main data frame
res_dir = '/Users/sepehrmortaheb/MyDrive/Academic/LEIA/Projects/BRAIN-DTI/Cosmonauts_StructFunc/Analysis/results/GSP/'
df <- read.xlsx(
  file.path(
    res_dir, 
    'df_sdi_cosmonauts_SCH100_c-21.xlsx'
  )
)

# Filtering the dataframe to keep the pre and post values of the first flight

# subjects to exclude
excluded_subjects <- c(
  "sub-cosmonaut13", 
  "sub-cosmonaut15", 
  "sub-cosmonaut16",
  "sub-cosmonaut26"
) 

df_filtered <- df %>%
  filter(
    flight == 'f1', 
    time %in% c("pre2", "post"),
    !subject %in% excluded_subjects
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    time = factor(
      time, 
      levels = c("pre2", "post")
    )
  )
```

```{r}
# Function to fit LMM per region
fit_lmm <- function(data) {
  model <- tryCatch(
    lmer(sdi ~ time + (1 | subject), data = data),
    error = function(e) return(NULL)
  )
  singular <- FALSE
  if (!is.null(model)) {
    singular <- isSingular(model, tol = 1e-4)
  }
  
  return(list(model = model, singular = singular))
}

# Run model per eigenvalue
model_results <- df_filtered %>%
  group_by(region) %>%
    nest() %>%
      mutate(
        fit = map(data, fit_lmm),
        model = map(fit, "model"),
        singular_fit = map_lgl(fit, "singular"),
        tidy = map(model, ~ if (!is.null(.x)) tidy(.x) else NULL)
      ) %>%
        unnest(tidy, keep_empty = TRUE) %>%
          filter(term == "timepost")  # keep only the post vs pre comparison

# Apply FDR correction
#model_results <- model_results %>%
model_results['p_fdr'] = p.adjust(model_results$p.value, method='fdr')

# Arrange by significance
model_results["abs_est"] = abs(model_results["estimate"])
model_results_sorted <- model_results %>%
  arrange(p_fdr)

# View top significant regions
print(head(model_results_sorted, 20))

# Save the results
model_results_clean <- model_results_sorted %>%
  select(-model, -fit, -data)

write.xlsx(
  model_results_clean, 
  file.path(
    res_dir, 
    "sdi/GSP_sdi_averageSC_LMM_SCH100.xlsx"
  ),
  overwrite = TRUE
)

```
